channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Software upgrades for Hyundai, Kia help cut theft rates, new HLDI research finds
item.description: Anti-theft software upgrades provided for Hyundai and Kia vehicles regularly targeted by thieves has cut theft rates by more than half, according to new research from the Highway Loss Data Institute.

item.title: US ambassador to Japan to skip A-bomb memorial service in Nagasaki because Israel was not invited
item.description: The U.S. ambassador to Japan has decided to skip this year’s atomic bombing memorial service in Nagasaki after Israel was not invited. The U.S.

item.title: Bob Woodward’s next book, ‘War,’ will focus on conflict abroad and politics at home
item.description: Bob Woodward’s next book, continuing a long tradition of election year releases, will focus on the conflicts in Ukraine and the Middle East and their place in American presidential politics.
